questions_and_notes: Is this variable needed?  What should cell_methods be? Note that there is no sensible way to regrid this field to a coarser grid.  The resulting values would be impossible to interpret.  Isn't the the sea ice fraction field the better one to request?
cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
long_name: Fraction of Time Steps with Sea Ice
comment: Fraction of time steps of the averaging period during which sea ice is present (siconc >0 ) in a grid cell
